Reviews.Title: I use these daily
Reviews.Author: Gil Foreman
Reviews.Content: I have used over a thousand of these and had 6 bad.. Not saying every batch is the same, but these have helped my business turn more profit on CCTV jobs..

Reviews.Title: High fail rate, not worth the look
Reviews.Author: Not Happy
Reviews.Content: Out of the 100 that I purchased, most did not work. I am going back to the more expensive ones purchased locally. In the long run it is cheaper to spend more on a higher quality unit to reduce to cost to install and troubleshoot these devices.
